name: Senior Seminar in Law and Society
description: The course will examine substantive debates in law and society. Restricted to Criminology and Socio-Legal Studies Specialists and Majors who have completed at least 10.0 credits. Topics will vary from year to year, see Department for details. [24S]
prerequisites: SOC205H5/231H5, 209H5, 221H5, 222H5, 0.5 SOC credit at the 300 level
